args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Prove that ∑_{n=1}^{∞} |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). Translate to Lean4. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry and import Mathlib at the top.

{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open intervalIntegral in
open intervalIntegral in
open Filter Asymptotics in

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Prove that ∑_{n=1}^{∞} |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). Translate to Lean4. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry and import Mathlib at the top. -/
theorem tsum_div_nat_pow_le_div_one_sub_ext {z : ℂ} (hz : ‖z‖ < 1) :
    ∑' n : ℕ, ‖z‖ ^ n / (n + 1) ≤ ‖z‖ / (1 - ‖z‖) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Prove that ∑_{n=1}^{∞} |z|^n / n ≤ |z| / (1 - |z|). -/
theorem tsum_abs_pow_div_le (z : Complex) (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  ∑' (n : ℕ), (Complex.abs z)^(n+1) / (n+1 : ℝ) ≤ Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z) := by sorry
